relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, lying in bed reading.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Oral cavity clear, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, no edema, cyanosis, or clubbing.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, follows commands, answers questions appropriately.

relevant_findings.general: Sitting comfortably on side of bed, conversing with son.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Normal S1, S2; no S3 or S4.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender, hypoactive bowel sounds; incision with staples in right upper quadrant; staple line clean and dry, no erythema; umbilical staples clean and dry.
relevant_findings.extremities: No pedal edema bilaterally, pulses 2+ dorsalis pedis bilaterally, no calf tenderness bilaterally; upper extremities warm and pink.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time; soft spoken with clear speech; no tremors.
relevant_findings.skin: Abrasions on elbows bilaterally; ecchymotic areas on hands and lower arms.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Physical examination findings improved from admission to discharge.
